task.title: Deleting the remote syslog server configuration by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can delete the remote syslog server configuration by using the imaserver delete RemoteLogServer command.

step.cmd: To delete the RemoteLogServer configuration, enter the following command:

info.note: The command must be capitalized as shown.

taskbody.example: The following example deletes the remote syslog server configuration: delete RemoteLogServer The requested configuration change has completed successfully.
